title: Gas Lift Injection Optimization
description: A production engineer adjusts the gas injection rate for a gas-lifted well to maximize oil production while minimizing gas consumption.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current gas injection rate and oil production rate for well P-501.
tasks.expected_outcome: The current operating parameters for the well are retrieved.

tasks.description: Consult the well's performance curve to determine the optimal gas injection rate for the current reservoir conditions.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis identifies that the well is being over-injected, wasting gas.

tasks.description: Adjust the injection valve setpoint via SCADA to reduce the gas injection rate to the optimal level.
tasks.expected_outcome: The injection rate is lowered, resulting in a slight increase in oil production and significant gas savings.
